home.title: Swiss Activities - Search and book your activity
home.description: Find the right activity for you on Swiss Activities and compare and choose from over 400 leisure activities.

switzerland.title: Destination Switzerland
switzerland.description: As a relatively small country, Switzerland never ceases to surprise with its remarkable diversity. Four official languages are spoken on a mere 40,000 square kilometres and the climate varies between arctic cold in winter and Mediterranean warmth in summer. With over 1,500 lakes, Switzerland is considered the water castle of Europe and the Alps make up over 50% of the land mass. If you've ever started your day on the Rhine in Basel and ended it on Lake Maggiore in Ticino, you know that a three-hour train ride in Switzerland can transport you to another world. Let us take you to all corners of this diverse country and introduce you to the sights, destinations and our Swiss Activities tips.

s.title: Swiss Activities - Search and book your activity

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: Swiss Activities shares the passion about travel and leisure activities.

hero.title: Time is leisure
hero.text: Swiss Activities is an online booking platform for leisure activities in Switzerland. We bring together hundreds of leisure providers with guests from Switzerland and abroad. At Swiss Activities you can book your experience directly and easily online.

who.title: Who we are
who.text: We are a young and motivated team that is passionate about leisure activities in Switzerland. We love trying out new activities ourselves, describing them, recommending them and making them bookable. At Swiss Activities we help you save a lot of time and nerves when searching, comparing and booking your next adventure.

start.title: Our start
start.text: The Corona Pandemic severely restricted travel in 2020. Travel abroad in particular was made more difficult. During this time we realized that there is no national booking platform for leisure activities to facilitate travel in Switzerland. That's why we created Swiss Activities.

march_2020.title: Bootstrapping Swiss Activities as a business model

partner.title: The Swiss Activities Mission for our partners
partner.text: Our mission is to enable leisure providers throughout Switzerland to have a simple and cost-effective online presence. We support our partners in marketing, sales and customer service and improve internal processes. We do not believe that Swiss Activities as a single platform can meet the needs of all users. That's why we consciously implement an open approach and work together with sales partners and bloggers at home and abroad to achieve the optimum from the customer reach.

kunden.title: The Swiss Activities Mission for our customers
kunden.text: We cover leisure providers throughout Switzerland: from self-employed freelancers to professionally organized destinations, from Lake Constance to Lake Geneva and from the busy cities to the narrow mountain valleys of the Swiss Alps. So you can easily book your next adventure. No matter where you are and what you feel like doing.

promise.title: Our promise
list: no time-consuming phone calls for clarifications
no endless research on countless websites
directly checkable availabilities
immediate reservations without detour
no hidden costs
uncomplicated and fast payment options
no tiresome queues
overview of attractive discounts
local offers

activities.title: Things To Do Switzerland 2022
activities.description: Find your activity in 2022 and book offers from the categories Points of Interest, outdoor activities, indoor activities, food & drinks as well as sightseeing
activities.intro: In Switzerland you will find numerous opportunities for activities in every season. The scenic diversity with 8,800 mountain peaks, 1,400 glaciers and 1,500 lakes and rivers allows for a wide range of outdoor activities. The transportation network is well developed, so that you can reach all excursion destinations and sightseeing activities easily by public transportation. However, there is also plenty of provision for indoor activities and those revolving around food & drink.

finances.title: Simple finance

local.title: Local travel experts
local.description: Swiss Activities was founded by local travel and tourism experts. We know the needs of our partners.

blocks.title: Achieve more Swiss customers
blocks.text: List your tours and products on the leading Swiss platform for leisure activities and win new Swiss guests.

blocks.title: Expert for marketing and promotion
blocks.text: Swiss Activities is in the same boat as you. Since we only achieve sales when a product has been bought and carried out, we pursue the same goals.

blocks.title: Start sales at the push of a button
blocks.text: Swiss Activities is connected to the leading reservation systems and offers a fully automatic exchange from creating the listing to the booking in the reservation system.

blocks.title: Experienced customer support
blocks.text: We take care of the customer questions and the booking while you can concentrate on an unforgettable experience for customers.

blocks.title: Simple cancellations
blocks.text: You can cancel the booking within 24 hours after booking.

blocks.title: Customer information
blocks.text: As usual with other marketplaces, we share all customer information right from the start. An early exchange enables uppseling or additional sales.

blocks.title: Online payments easy
blocks.text: We accept the payments of the customers to simplify your accounting. You get the payments weekly/monthly after the tour carried out.

blocks.title: Cancellations and repayments
blocks.text: All cancellations and repayments are free.

blocks.title: Reversurals
blocks.text: If a customer triggered a return debit, we will take over the communication with the bank. There are no additional costs.

blocks.title: Founded by industrial experts
blocks.text: Work with an experienced team with a focus on Swiss tourism. We support you with every step to ensure that your product will be booked online.

blocks.title: Our important partners
blocks.text: We have worked with many Swiss tour operators in the past and understand their problems. Our mission is to build a marketplace that is used by the operators and their customers.

pricing.title: Price structure
pricing.subtitle: 9% (excl. VAT) + 0.30 CHF per transaction
pricing.description: Free activation, no monthly fixed costs or hidden fees. You only pay for a brokered guest. Cancellations and rebookings are also free of charge

faq.title: Free marketing
faq.text: Your registration is free and there are no fixed costs. You can create as many activities as you like. We market your offer and help you to open up new target groups and make your activity known.

faq.title: Pay as you go
faq.text: Only pay for a successful mediation. The cost of a mediated booking is only 9% + 0.30 CHF excl. VAT.

faq.title: Content creation
faq.text: Swiss Activities supplements your offer to answer the possible open questions from your guests. We list your offer multilingual and take over SEO optimization to get more range. Would you like to have the text of your offer written by us from scratch? Talk to our sales team about the possibilities.

includes: Topplatization of the offer within Swiss Activities

faq.title: New website
faq.text: We will create your new website with 10-12 new websites and help you create the content. If desired, the complete content can be written (additional costs).

faq.title: Booking system
faq.text: We will help you choose the right booking system and its installation.

faq.title: SEO optimizations
faq.text: We help you to be found on Google.

tech.title: Technology partner
tech.description: Integration with all leading reservation systems. Don't you find your reservation system? Get it contact with us.

blocks.title: How much does it cost me to register at Swiss Activities and the Commission of a mediation?
blocks.text: Registration is free and there is no fixed costs for switching on activities. The cost of a booking is 9% + 0.30 CHF excl. VAT. If you use a reservation software, you usually have to pay a fee there. Please contact your customer advisor for the reservation system or channel manager.

blocks.title: How and when do I get the money after successfully placing a customer?
blocks.text: The money is transferred to your bank account weekly after performing.

blocks.title: How safe is the Swiss Activities platform?
blocks.text: Swiss Activities uses the highest PCI standard for processing credit cards transactions. Payyo is used to handle the transactions, which in turn works with Six/WorldPay.

blocks.title: Can I delete my entry at any time?
blocks.text: Yes, you can withdraw from the contract at any time. There is no minimum contract term and there are no costs from the termination.

blocks.title: How does the booking process work?
list: The customer selects a leisure activity.
The customer entered the name of his group.
The customer entered additional information such as allergies, telephone number etc. and his credit card data. We use the highest PCI security standards to transmit credit cards transactions.
The customer receives his ticket by email. You will also receive a booking confirmation.

blocks.title: Can I switch on several leisure activities?
blocks.text: Yes, you can switch on any number of leisure activities. However, please only record as many offers as you can serve.

blocks.title: Which activities are suitable for activation at Swiss Activities?
blocks.text: Swiss Activities is a platform for all leisure activities. Activities with fixed start times (guided tours, special events), but also activities that can be booked regardless of a certain time (e.g. day tickets, daily inputs, etc.) can be switched on.

blocks.title: What activities can I not switch on at the moment?
blocks.text: Unfortunately, rentals and vouchers are currently not yet possible. We are working to constantly expand our offer with new features. We are happy to keep you up to date with adjustments.

blocks.title: Can I integrate my existing booking software with Swiss Activities?
blocks.text: Yes, we work with Experience Bank, which tells us the availability via an interface. We are currently integrated: Trekksoft, Waldhart, Zaui, Smeetz.com, Pendent or in planning :, Tomas, Farharbor, Rezdy, N-Tree, if there is no connection to Experience Bank, you are welcome to at Tanja@Swissactivities. report to discuss a new possible interface.

hero.title: Become part of Swiss Activities
hero.description: Register for free at Swiss Activities and increase your reach with Swiss and international guests. Your advantages at an overview
list: Be found on Google as a company and with your offers. And that in 4 languages!
Open up a new sales channel
Benefit from our free customer support
Connect your reservation system and manage your bookings directly in it.
A new booking - your customer. We do not hide our partners and want to offer the customer the best booking experience.
Low costs: 9% Commission + 0.30 CHF costs a new customer. No fixed costs or hidden fees.
Your customers can pay in all local payment methods such as Twint, purchase on account and the common credit cards.

affiliate.title: Affiliate
affiliate.description: Take part as a partner at Swiss Activities and earn 3% fixed fee from the first booking. There is no fixed costs.

hero.title: Earn commissions and support Swiss tourism
hero.description: Connect yourself to local providers from your area or the whole of Switzerland and earn 3%per booking. Hotels and apartments can show your presence for Swiss Activities free of charge.
steps: Create your market place or widget

flat.title: Hotel and apartments visible
flat.text: Switch your hotel or apartment on Swiss Activities for free and network with local tourism operating providers to earn commissions. You can also create your own marketplace for activities in a few minutes.

blog.title: Partner for your blog
blog.text: Find the right offers to make your blog even more user -friendly. Connect activities within your blog and earn a commission of 3% per booking mediated.

hyperlinks.title: Use hyperlinks or create your own marketplace

blocks.title: Affiliate link
blocks.text: Create your own profile and select the right offers. Ideally, you add your affiliate link directly into your text. This setup only takes a few minutes and you already have the options for generating your first francs.

blocks.title: Marketplace
blocks.text: Do you have a lot of traffic on your website? Or you have high utilization at the switch/reception because customers inquire about information about activities in the region? Create your own marketplace to present certain offers and present your own portfolio to your customers.

blog.title: Swiss Activities travel guide
blog.description: As a relatively small country, Switzerland never ceases to surprise with its remarkable diversity. Four official languages are spoken on a mere 40,000 square kilometres and the climate varies between arctic cold in winter and Mediterranean warmth in summer. With over 1,500 lakes, Switzerland is considered the water castle of Europe and the Alps make up over 50% of the land mass. If you've ever started your day on the Rhine in Basel and ended it on Lake Maggiore in Ticino, you know that a three-hour train ride in Switzerland can transport you to another world. Let us take you to all corners of this diverse country and introduce you to the sights, destinations and our Swiss Activities tips.
blog.pointOfInterestDescription: When you think of Switzerland, you often have an image of snowy mountains, turquoise lakes, delicious chocolate or strong-smelling cheese in your mind's eye. In fact, there is an incredible amount to discover in Switzerland. Whether you're looking for a medieval castle or a breathtaking glacier, whether you want to stroll through a lush vineyard or a dreamy old town alley, or whether you want to glide across a turquoise-blue lake aboard a historic paddle steamer or sportily in your own kayak, Switzerland leaves nothing to be desired. The Swiss Activities travel guides bring you closer to all aspects of Switzerland - starting with the breathtaking Jungfrau Railway and ending with a visit to the Museum of Transport in Lucerne.
blog.destinationsDescription: Switzerland consists of 26 cantons and roughly of three major geological regions: the Alps, the Jura and the Swiss Plateau. The Alps are composed of the pre-Alpine region, the high-Alpine region and the southern side of the Alps. The country is divided into 13 tourist regions, which also include the neighbouring Principality of Liechtenstein. The Swiss Activities travel guides are located in these regions to bring you closer to a destination. No matter whether it is a mountain peak, an attraction, a city or an entire region. You will find exciting content such as the highlights, possible activities, the geographical location, important information about the journey and the climate as well as our best Swiss Activities tips.
blog.insiderBlogDescription: The diversity of Switzerland does not make it easy to find your way through the jungle of possibilities, activities, excursion destinations and sights. That's why Swiss Activities has a variety of articles, lists and insider tips for specific questions. They are meant to inspire, inform and entertain you. Here you will find ultimate guides, articles with thematic listings as well as general information on all kinds of topics concerning Switzerland.
